Deprecated API

  • Classes 
    Class Description
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.aura.EnrageAura
    Use a conventional aura with a IsDamagedCondition whose ConditionArg.TARGET is the EntityReference.TRIGGER_HOST (i.e. the aura host) instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.BuffHeroSpell
    Use BuffSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.BuffWeaponSpell
    Use BuffSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.CastFromGroupSpell
    Use a DiscoverSpell instead, since groups were never well thought-out anyway.

    Prompts the player to make choices from the specified CardType.GROUP card, and casts the choice.

    In order to use this spell, first create a group card. A group file may look like: 

                                                      {
                                                  "name": "Plan Your Attack!",
                                                  "baseManaCost": 0,
                                                  "type": "GROUP",
                                                  "heroClass": "BROWN",
                                                  "group": [
                                                    {
                                                      "class": "MetaSpell",
                                                      "target": "SELF",
                                                      "name": "Stalk Your Prey",
                                                      "description": "Gain +2/+1 and Stealth.",
                                                      "spells": [
                                                        {
                                                          "class": "BuffSpell",
                                                          "target": "SELF",
                                                          "attackBonus": 2,
                                                          "hpBonus": 1
                                                        },
                                                        {
                                                          "class": "AddAttributeSpell",
                                                          "target": "SELF",
                                                          "attribute": "STEALTH"
                                                        }
                                                      ]
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                      "class": "SummonSpell",
                                                      "target": "NONE",
                                                      "value": 2,
                                                      "name": "Consult the Trees",
                                                      "description": "Summon two 1/1 Saplings.",
                                                      "card": "token_sapling"
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                      "class": "DamageSpell",
                                                      "target": "SPELL_TARGET",
                                                      "value": 2,
                                                      "name": "Leap From the Canopy",
                                                      "description": "Deal 2 damage."
                                                    }
                                                  ],
                                                  "rarity": "FREE",
                                                  "collectible": false,
                                                  "set": "CUSTOM",
                                                  "fileFormatVersion": 1
                                                }
    Observe that the CardDesc.type is CardType.GROUP; each choice is represented by a SpellDesc in group; and that the SpellDesc in CardDesc.group have the SpellArg.NAME and SpellArg.DESCRIPTION specified.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.CastRepeatedlySpell
    See RecastWhileSpell for a better implementation of this spell, since this one is prone to errors.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.ClearOverloadSpell
    Use a SetAttributeSpell instead: 
                                      {
                                    "class": "SetAttributeSpell",
                                    "target": "FRIENDLY_PLAYER",
                                    "attribute": "OVERLOAD",
                                    "value": 0
                                  }
    Resets the player's overload status.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.CloneMinionSpell
    Use SummonSpell instead: 
                                      {
                                    "class": "SummonSpell",
                                    "target": The target that you would like to clone.
                                  }

    Clones a specified minion.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.ConditionalAttackBonusSpell
    Use a BuffAura instead. For example, to give a minion +1 attack only if the friendly player has more than 3 cards: 
                                      "aura": {
                                    "class": "BuffAura",
                                    "attackBonus": 1,
                                    "hpBonus": 0,
                                    "target": "SELF",
                                    "condition": {
                                      "class": "CardCountCondition",
                                      "targetPlayer": "SELF",
                                      "operation": "GREATER",
                                      "value": 3
                                    }
                                  }

    Gives a minion an attack bonus with a given condition.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.CreateCardSpell
    This spell is fairly brittle and you will be better off implementing the intended effects directly. See CreateCardFromChoicesSpell for an example.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.CreateSummonSpell
    This spell is fairly brittle and you will be better off implementing the intended effects directly. See CreateCardFromChoicesSpell for an example.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.custom.PutMiniCopyInHandSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.custom.RecastMinionSpells
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.custom.SummonOneOneCopiesSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.condition.HasEntityCondition
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.source.GraveyardMinionsSource
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.source.GraveyardSource
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.source.GraveyardSpellsSource
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.valueprovider.DeadMinionsThisTurn
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.DiscoverCardSpell
    Use DiscoverSpell with a "spell": {"class": "ReceiveCardSpell"} instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.DiscoverDrawSpell
    Use DiscoverSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.DiscoverFilteredCardSpell
    This class is currently only used for tri-class card discoveries.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.DiscoverOptionSpell
    The discover option spell is fairly brittle. You should use DiscoverSpell instead, discovering a sequence of cards and playing one by casting or summoning it.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.DiscoverRandomCardSpell
    Use DiscoverSpell with a SpellArg.CARD_FILTER instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.DrawCardAndDoSomethingSpell
    Use a DrawCardSpell with a sub spell like {"class": "DrawCardSpell", "spell": {"class": ..., "target": "OUTPUT"}} instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.EquipRandomWeaponSpell
    by EquipWeaponSpell.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.PutRandomMinionOnBoardSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.RandomSpellTargetSpell
    Use CastRandomSpellSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.ReceiveCardAndDoSomethingSpell
    by ReceiveCardSpell, which supports sub spells in SpellArg.SPELL.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.ReceiveRandomCardSpell
    by ReceiveCardSpell with the argument SpellArg.RANDOM_TARGET set to true.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.RemoveCardAndDoSomethingSpell
    Use a RemoveCardSpell with a sub spell like {"class": "RemoveCardSpell", "spell": {"class": ..., "target": "OUTPUT"}} instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.RenounceClassSpell
    Has no implementation.

    Renounce Darkness is now implemented as a combination of other spells and effects.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.ReplaceCardLocationSpell
    Use ReplaceCardsSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.ReturnMinionToHandSpell
    Use ReturnTargetToHandSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SetHeroHpSpell
    Use SetHpSpell instead.

    Sets the target actor's HP to the specified SpellArg.VALUE, including increasing the maximum HP if necessary.

    This spell does work for other actors besides heroes, but it is recommended to use SetHpSpell instead.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonCopySpell
    by SummonSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonNewAttackTargetSpell
    Implemented using a SummonSpell with a OverrideTargetSpell as the subspell.
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonOneOneCopySpell
    by SummonSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonRandomMinionFilteredSpell
    by SummonSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonRandomMinionFromSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonRandomNotOnBoardSpell
    by SummonSpell
    net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.SummonRandomSpell
    by SummonSpell
